player.name: Kevin Durant
player.physicalDescription: extremely tall 6'10" with impossibly long arms and lean frame, slim build, short hair, facial hair, dark skin, effortless athletic grace
player.archetype: The Slim Reaper, pure scorer, complicated legacy and loyalties

figure.name: Jonathan
figure.attributeDescription: finely crafted bow of a prince and skilled archer, quiver of arrows, symbol of his warrior prowess
figure.visualStyle: prince of Israel, beloved friend of David, noble warrior
figure.clothing: prince's tunic of fine quality but practical for battle, light armor, royal but understated compared to his father Saul
figure.physicalDescription: handsome noble young man, athletic warrior's build, kind loyal eyes, short dark hair and beard, olive skin, carries himself with quiet dignity
figure.archetype: The Loyal Prince, elite warrior, chose friendship over throne

connection.thematic: Both possessed elite talent but complex loyalties that defined their legacies
connection.narrative: Jonathan had Saul's throne waiting. KD had OKC's love. Both made choices that still spark debate.
connection.relationship: Elite talents whose loyalty decisions became their defining stories

interactions.description: Two elite talents standing together, complicated but capable
Brotherhood between those who understand the weight of choices
